product_name: Lightweights for Clothing and Gear Power Reflectors
long_description: Lightweights for Clothing and Gear(TM) power reflectors are made from 3M Scotchlite(TM) reflective material and can be placed on clothing of all kinds for visibility from all directions. Lightweights for Clothing and Gear power reflectors stick or iron onto fabric, leather, rubber and nearly anything else; no need to spend big bucks on reflective clothing. Apply to bags, gloves, boots and backpacks, pet collars, raingear and umbrellas; even all your non-stretchy stuff too, such as your bike and helmet. Great for triathletes, trick-or-treaters and anyone in between who wants to be seen at night. Extremely elastic, lightweight and tissue-thin to flow and move effortlessly with even your stretchiest clothing. Easy to follow instructions show you how to obtain iron-on permanence that holds through hundreds of machine washings on most fabrics. Sleek and powerful super bright stick-on relectors; includes 60 ovals (2 in. and 1 in.) and circles (0.5 in. and 0.25 in.).
